concept.title: Publications
concept.shortdesc: The Publications widget displays publications that are available for you to view.

conbody.p: A publication is a DITAmap, that has been published to DITAweb. Publishing a map to DITAweb means that the map has been converted to HTML so that it can be displayed in a web browser. If you use DITAval files to manage conditional text, you can publish the same map with different DITAval files to create separate but linked publications.
The Publications widget displays a list of publications that you have permission to view. The individual topics in the publication are displayed in the Contents widget.
